#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int fq[256];

int main()

{

	int t,i,j,k,n;

	string s;

	cin>>t;

	while(t--)

	{

		cin>>s;

		n=s.length();

		for(i=0;i<n;++i)

		++fq[s[i]];

		int counti=0;

		for(int i='a';i<='z';++i)

		counti+=(fq[i]+1)/2,fq[i]=0;

		for(int i='A';i<='Z';++i)

                counti+=(fq[i]+1)/2,fq[i]=0;

		cout<<counti<<"\n";

	}

	return 0;

}
